name: Star Controller
description:
An alien invasion draws near. The allied intergalactic forces have come up with the ultimate ship to combat them, the Mark 11. But no one is able to control this complex spaceship, except for one: The Star Controller.

Controls: WASD or Arrow Keys

How it fits the theme of the jam: Since time immemorial, the game controller has been the method through which players interact with their games. This game aims to fit the theme "Out of Control" by taking the controls out of the players physical hands and thrusting it into the game screen. Control the little astronaut around the controller to contol your ship.

Note: A .exe file can be found below if the html version doesn't work for some reason.
